Curriculum Vitæ

Beneath you will find the most recent version of my CV, which is also avaiable for download. Please note that the private section and the reference section are omitted in this public version.

Education

Martin-Luther-University, Halle-Wittenberg2010 to present Anticipate completion of B.Sc. in Economics in 2013.

Justus-von-Liebig Gymnasium, Göppingen2005 to 2010 A-level in English, Ethics, Mathematics and Chemistry & Dietetics.

BSA School of Health Management, Munich2007 (6 months) Education as High-Performance Sports & Bodytrainer.

Employment

Founder & CEO of Green Mill Trading, LLC2013 to present Engaged in trading at the foreign exchange market for companies own purposes.

Research Assistant at the Chair of International Economic Relations2013 to present Ongoing work.

Student Assistant at the First Department of Medicine2012 to 2013 Structurized and maintained the Curriculum and Encyclopedia for Dr. med. J. Walldorf.

Freelance LaTeX Typesetter2012 to present Converted mathematical or scientific papers into print-ready documents for numerous individuals.

Co-Founder of Seidenbach S.á.r.l.2010 to 2012 Handmade dress shirt and suit manufacture for men.

Freelance Product Visualizer2009 to 2012 Provided creative/marketing solutions such as websites, UI-Design etc. including standardization and harmonization of interface appearance.

Personal Assistant at Physical Therapy Office Wiaderny2008 to 2010 Structurized and maintained the office system, including data management, carrying out background research and presenting findings.

Freelance Personal Trainer2007 to 2010 Monitored and supervised a group of 20 overweight clients. Designed and implemented personalised exercise and diet programs targeting specific conditions and concerns including obesity, arthritis and high cholesterol.

Skills

Problem Solving
Excellent analytical and logical reasoning skills. Able to multi-task. Can learn and utilize new skills quickly. Interested in interdisciplinary topics. Able to lead or work within a group environment.
